Package emissary.directory

Interface IRemoteDirectory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDirectoryPlace, IServiceProviderPlace
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectoryPlace
    public interface IRemoteDirectory
extends IDirectoryPlace
    Interface for inter-directory operations over http These methods are designed to only be called by the remote inter-directory communications layer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  IRemoteDirectory.Lookup
      Helper class to look up an instance of the local directory cast to this interface if possible

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface emissary.directory.IDirectoryPlace

        REMOTE_COST_OVERHEAD, REMOTE_EXPENSE_OVERHEAD

      • Fields inherited from interface emissary.place.IServiceProviderPlace

        SPROUT_KEY

    • Method Detail

      • irdAddPlaces

        void irdAddPlaces​(List<DirectoryEntry> entryList,
                  boolean propagating)
        Register a set of entries. This signature only meant to be called from within emissary.server.mvc.adapters.DirectoryAdapter.
        Parameters:
        entryList - the new entries to add
        propagating - true if going down the line

      • irdRemovePlaces

        int irdRemovePlaces​(List<String> keys,
                    boolean propagating)
        Deregister places. Removes all keys for the specified places. Should only be called from emissary.server.mvc.adapters.DirectoryAdapter
        Parameters:
        keys - four-tuple key for the place
        propagating - true if going down the line
        Returns:
        count of keys removes

      • irdFailDirectory

        int irdFailDirectory​(String key,
                     boolean propagating)
        Remove directory
        Parameters:
        key - string key of failed directory
        propagating - true if headed back down the directory chain
        Returns:
        count of how many places were removed locally

      • irdAddPeerDirectories

        void irdAddPeerDirectories​(Set<String> keys)
        Add a Set of peer directory to this one
        Parameters:
        keys - set of string key for peer directories
